Title: Tap the potential to support agriculture
Designer: Bai Yang (白洋)Gao Fengwen (高奉文)Zhang Chengsi (张成思)
Publisher: Liaoning renmin chubanshe (辽宁人民出版社)
Notes: A restaurant worker (waitress?) delivers food scraps from restaurants in Shenyang (according to the text on the tank) to serve as pig fodder.The impressum of the poster qualifies all three designers as "workers". At least two of them (Bai Yang and Zhang Chengsi) are also known as artists.
